hero_heading: Creating Meaningful Community for Adults with Autism
hero_subtitle: First class, safe residential housing at reasonable rates for adults on the Autism Spectrum, with comprehensive support services and community connection.
hero_quote: I could just grieve him terribly forever, which I will, or I could also redirect that pain and loss into something meaningful, purposeful and positive.

mission.label: Our Mission
mission.title: Providing More Than Just Housing
mission.subtitle: Johnnie's Place offers first class residential housing and comprehensive support services for adults diagnosed with and on the Autism Spectrum.
